welcome-message-user:
Hi, welcome to {{SITENAME}}! Thanks for your edit to the [[:$1]] page.

Please leave a message on [[$2|my talk page]] if I can help with anything! $3
welcome-message-anon:
Hi, welcome to {{SITENAME}}! Thanks for your edit to the [[:$1]] page.
